attributes.action: STOP THESE UNFAIR PENSION CHANGES FOR WOMEN IN THEIR 50'S
attributes.additional_details: Women in their 50's are taking the brunt of the pension changes, it should be done more gradually so women won't have to lose out on thousands of pounds of pension money.. Pensions are planned for years in advance and the Government come along and change the goal-posts without any thought to those women who will suffer most...the latest amendment is too little, too late. PLEASE.SIGN THIS PETITION NOW and MAKE YOUR STAND for fairness.
